meanings.definition: A person who looks casually through books or magazines.
meanings.sent1: The browser at the library enjoyed flipping through different magazines.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a browser who loves spending hours in the bookstore.
meanings.sent3: The browser chuckled as they found a hidden message in the magazine.
meanings.sent4: She was a browser of stories, always seeking new adventures within the pages.
meanings.sent5: The young browser's eyes lit up with excitement as they discovered a treasure trove of books.

meanings.definition: A program with a graphical user interface for displaying HTML files, used to navigate the World Wide Web.
meanings.sent1: The browser on my computer helps me explore different websites easily.
meanings.sent2: I use a browser to access the internet and search for information.
meanings.sent3: The browser on my phone seems to have a mind of its own, opening tabs randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were glued to the browser as she scrolled through the latest news updates.
meanings.sent5: The browser acted as a gateway to a vast digital realm, connecting users worldwide.
